marklogic.body:
GOOD HEAVENS! EXACTLY HOW MANY TIMES HAS THIS FOSSIL HAD HIS EYES DONE....STOP, OR THERE GOING TO POP OUT AND LAND IN YOUR WATERCRESS SOUP!"
Awwwwwwwwwwwwwwww! Poor creaky wreckage of an aging 'movie' star, Robert Redford. Cheese with that 'whine?' To answer you liberal question, he stands where he Always has...on YOUR side, you old baggage....to the far, disgusting left. I couldn't be drug into one of your movies, you Bleeding heart liberal creep, if I were out Cold and hog tied.
But it's o.k. Bobby....you can still empty YOUR pockets for Obozo or make your donation checks directly to the U.S. Treasury. But I don't think that's what you had in mind, is it. You'd like ME to give Obozo my money. Well...skroue both of you!
